tasks.title: Complete project proposal
tasks.description: Finish writing and submit project proposal document.

tasks.title: Prepare presentation slides
tasks.description: Create slides for the project presentation.

tasks.title: Review project requirements
tasks.description: Review the project requirements document thoroughly.

tasks.title: Update project documentation
tasks.description: Update project documentation to reflect recent changes.

tasks.title: Test new features
tasks.description: Perform thorough testing on newly implemented features.

tasks.description: Deploy the application to the staging server for testing.

tasks.description: Address and fix bugs identified during QA testing.
